events.message: The insured reported an accident involving their car colliding with a street light on January 2nd.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident due to the vehicle collision described in the report.
An experienced claims agent was assigned to the case to ensure prompt follow-up and assistance for the claimant.
Acknowledgment of the claim was sent to the insured with instructions on how to proceed and submit required documentation.
The claimant was asked to submit photos of the damaged vehicle and the police accident report for investigation purposes.
Received photos and official accident report from the insured, providing detailed evidence of the car collision.
Claims investigation team began assessing the circumstances of the collision and verifying the damages reported.
Investigation concluded with confirmation that the collision was not the fault of the insured and damages are covered.
A settlement offer was prepared based on the damage valuation and sent to the claimant for acceptance.
The claimant responded positively, expressing satisfaction with the prompt handling and proposed settlement amount.
The claim was officially approved following acceptance of the settlement offer by the insured party.
The insurance payout was processed and issued to the claimantâ€™s bank account as compensation for vehicle repairs.
The claim case has been formally closed as all processes were completed and claimant confirmed receipt of payment.
All claim documents and correspondence were archived securely in the system for future reference if needed.
